## PlayerUI.append() method

Appends UI HTML to the player's existing client UI.

**Signature:**

```typescript
append(htmlUri: string): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

htmlUri


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The UI HTML uri to append.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

Multiple calls in the same tick will append in call order. If used with `.load()` in the same tick, appends occur after the load.
